subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Freeman, a second-year running back, gained at least 149 yards in each of his first three starts. He leads the N.F.L. in yards from scrimmage (645) and touchdowns (8).
snippet: Freeman, a second-year running back, gained at least 149 yards in each of his first three starts. He leads the N.F.L. in yards from scrimmage (645) and touchdowns (8).
